alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 2:44PM MDT until August 17 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 244 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Colony, or 12 miles northwest of Belle Fourche, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Spearfish, Belle Fourche, Whitewood, Saint Onge, Fruitdale, Belle Fourche Reservoir, Bridal Veil Falls and northern Spearfish Canyon. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 6 and 24. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
